description:
1. squelch logging on EOF, this is normal when a connection closes.
2. don't exit on an Accept() error -- these are usually the result of hitting the file descriptor limit.
3. fix ServeConn() to block as specified by the comments.

messages.text:
Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change.

LGTM but msolo@gmail is not in CONTRIB etc. nor in the CLA.  mike: do  
you want to go in, or should i just patch it msyelf?  or you could go  
in as a googler if you change the mail on the CL.

-rob

On Apr 11, 2010, at 8:39 PM, Russ Cox wrote:

> LGTM
>
> leaving for r.
>
>
> -- 
> To unsubscribe, reply using "remove me" as the subject.

also please fix typo ("the normal") in the CL desc.

also also the description is formatted funny at http://codereview.appspot.com/873045/show 
.  please check that the original is OK.

-rob

Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

you can just patch it in manually.
